external_homepage: Browser - a lightweight, innovative browser for Mac and Windows
name: Brows3r
short_description:
Brows3r is a lightweight, innovative browser for Mac and Windows built in with many useful features that other browsers don't offer, life download limiter, default encryption and on-the-fly proxy's

The project was started by iceb3rg for people in schools and companies that have restrictive internet policies, including those that have download limits, blocked sites and heavy monitoring.
summary: Browser is a lightweight, innovative browser for Mac and Windows
